dmca.title: Cody Media complains of bloggers' adult images
dmca.body:
December 12, 2006 

To whom it may concern, 

I work at Seancody.com. It was brought to our attention that few of your 
members have downloaded our images and ?re promoting them on your site. 
This is completely unacceptable. I am pretty sure that you are not aware of this, 
however, we need to figure out a way so that you know which ones are our 
images and that they are taken down IMMEDIATELY. All images under the name Sean Cody should be taken down immediately. I do not want to escalate this 
situation and to get our attorneys involved. Your cooperation in this matter is 
greatly appreciated.

We have all rights to ALL Seancody images. No one other than us (Cody Media) 
is allowed to copy, distribute and profit from these videos.
 
Not only is it illegal for your firm to post adult content without the 2257 
information, you
